Package fr.umlv.chathack.resources.frames

Interface ServerVisitor

All Known Implementing Classes:
ServerContext
public interface ServerVisitor

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void answerFromDatabase​(long id, boolean positiveAnswer)
    Authenticates or deny the authentication of a client according to the database answer.
    void broadcastMessage​(String message)
    Broadcast a public message to the server, so every connected client can receive it.
    InetAddress getInetAddress()
    Retrieve the client's IP address.
    String getLogin()
    Retrieve the client's login.
    void log​(Level level, String msg)
    Log a message.
    void sendBackFrame​(Frame frame)
    Send a frame to this client.
    void sendFrame​(Frame frame, String dest)
    Send a frame to a specific client connected to the server.
    void tryLogin​(String login)
    Try to login the client to the server.

    Try to login the client to the server.

  • Method Details

    • log

      void log​(Level level, String msg)
      Log a message.
      Parameters:
      level - One of the message level identifiers, e.g., SEVERE.
      msg - The string message (or a key in the message catalog).

    • tryLogin

      void tryLogin​(String login, String password)
      Try to login the client to the server. It succeeds if the logins are registered in the database.
      Parameters:
      login -
      password -

    • tryLogin

      void tryLogin​(String login)
      Try to login the client to the server. It succeeds if the given login is not already authenticated by the server and does not exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      login -

    • answerFromDatabase

      void answerFromDatabase​(long id, boolean positiveAnswer)
      Authenticates or deny the authentication of a client according to the database answer.
      Parameters:
      id - The identifier of the request to the database.
      positiveAnswer - The response, True if positive, False if negative.

    • broadcastMessage

      void broadcastMessage​(String message) throws IllegalStateException
      Broadcast a public message to the server, so every connected client can receive it.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to broadcast.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If the client is not able to send a broadcast a frame.

    • sendFrame

      void sendFrame​(Frame frame, String dest) throws IllegalStateException, IllegalArgumentException
      Send a frame to a specific client connected to the server.
      Parameters:
      frame - The frame to send.
      dest - The recipient client's login.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If the client is not able to send a frame to another client.
      IllegalArgumentException - If the recipient client does not exist or is not able to receive a frame.

    • sendBackFrame

      void sendBackFrame​(Frame frame)
      Send a frame to this client.
      Parameters:
      frame - The frame to send.

    • getLogin

      String getLogin()
      Retrieve the client's login.
      Returns:
      The client login.

    • getInetAddress

      InetAddress getInetAddress() throws IOException
      Retrieve the client's IP address.
      Returns:
      The client's IP address.
      Throws:
      IOException
